mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_login_id, user_password, user_email, user_nickname, user_age, user_position, user_career, user_intro, user_portfolio_link, user_contact_link, user_profile_img) VALUES (#{userLoginId}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, #{userNickname}, #{userAge}, #{userPosition}, #{userCareer}, #{userIntro}, #{userPortfolioLink}, #{userContactLink}, #{userProfileImg})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_password = #{userPassword}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_nickname = #{userNickname}, user_age = #{userAge}, user_position = #{userPosition}, user_career = #{userCareer}, user_intro = #{userIntro}, user_portfolio_link = #{userPortfolioLink}, user_contact_link = #{userContactLink}, user_profile_img = #{userProfileImg} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE user SET user_status = 'deleted' WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_login_id=#{userLoginId} AND user_password=#{userPassword}

SELECT js.job_id, js.job_genre, js.job_content_title, js.job_deadline, js.created_at, js.user_id, u.user_profile_img, u.user_career, u.user_nickname, COALESCE(c.comment_count, 0) AS comment_count, COALESCE(v.view_count, 0) AS view_count FROM job_search js INNER JOIN user u ON js.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS comment_count FROM comment WHERE comment_status != 'deleted' GROUP BY job_id ) c ON js.job_id = c.job_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(view_id) AS view_count FROM view GROUP BY job_id ) v ON js.job_id = v.job_id WHERE js.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id, pf_id, pf_price, pf_thumbnail, pf_title, pf_location, pf_start_date, pf_deadline FROM performance WHERE user_id = #{userId};
